shorttext.p: The psychedelically radical video below was shot with a $100,000 high-speed camera called the Typhoon HD4, which can capture intricacies of ocean waves normally imperceivable to the human eye. Shot as a teaser for the BBCís upcoming South Pacific series, the clip features surfer Dylan Longbottom in a 12-foot monster barrel wave.

Plastic Beach is the third studio album by English virtual band Gorillaz, released 3 March 2010 on Parlophone and Virgin Records. Conceived from an unfinished Gorillaz project called Carousel, the album was recorded during June 2008 to November 2009 and produced primarily by group co-creator Damon Albarn.
Should your man smell like an Old Spice man? Old Spice has 71 years of experience helping guys improve their mansmells with deodorant, antiperspirant and fragrances.

The song is a mid-tempo ballad sung from the perspective of the film's lead character, Alice. Lavigne wrote the song after asking Disney executives and film director Tim Burton if she could write a song for the film. The song was produced by Butch Walker and mixed by Lavigne's former husband Deryck Whibley.

The time has come for players to carve their name in history. One touch, tackle or free kick could crush a nation's hopes or cause them to build a statue in your honour. Drogba, Rooney and Ronaldo are ready to Write The Future. Get the song, Hocus Pocus by Focus, for free at nikefootball.com!
Before Lord and Lady Gaga parted ways, citing creative differences, they made this video together. Download the Key of Awesome on iTunes! The video Lady Gaga doesn't want you to see.

This is a Mastercard Priceless Spec commercial, It was shot on Super 16mm film, had a 2K telecine, and edited on a 1080p master in Avid Media Composer. Please visit http://milkmanthefilm.com for more information.

shorttext.span: America's Got Talent Michael Grasso Audition
shorttext.p: America's Got Talent is a talent show that features singers, dancers, magicians, comedians and other performers of all ages competing for the advertised top prize of US$1 million. Starting in the third season, Magician Michael Grasso astounds the crowd with his illusions during his America's Got Talent audition.

Hard Times features a variety of characters from The Simpsons, most notably greedy billionaire C. Montgomery Burns. As Mr. Burns faces the loss of his fortune and worldly belongings, he learns to appreciate life's simple pleasures like friends and family. The commercial was first shown during 2010's Super Bowl XLIV (44) 2010.

My name is Hikakin. I'm Japanese Beatboxer. Super Mario Bros is no doubt the most popular beatboxing song because of its universal appeal. Neatorama says, "This rendition is undeniably impressive. I especially enjoyed the second half, when he hits the darker music of the underground levels."
For Mozart's birthday... this is the Overture of "Die Zauberflöte" by Mozart. Played on root beer bottles.

The ones we love tend to stay in our hearts and minds long after the relationship ends. While some move on quickly, others dwell and heal at a slower pace. Whatever the case, the thoughts, emotions and memories we experience during this time are heartwrenchingly powerful and real.

Behind the scenes at Susan Boyle's Harper's Bazaar photo shoot. Susan Magdalane Boyle is a Scottish singer who came to international public attention when she appeared as a contestant on reality TV programme Britain's Got Talent on 11 April 2009, singing "I Dreamed a Dream" from Les Misérables.
